name: pnp-devproxy-http-to-https-redirect
title: Force HTTPS during development
shortDescription: Automatically rewrite HTTP requests to HTTPS during development using Dev Proxy. Match production security locally and test HTTPS without certificate hassles.
longDescription: Automatically rewrite HTTP requests to HTTPS during development using Dev Proxy. Match production security locally and test HTTPS without certificate hassles.

thumbnails.alt: Dev Proxy rewriting HTTP to HTTPS

references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to the Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.description: Instructions on how to configure the Dev Proxy to use a different configuration file.
